page.title: 10INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: Off Bramhall Moor Lane is the Bramhall Park Industrial Estate, comprising of several maufacturing works. The largest of these is Mullards - electronic manufacturing and developing works, which employs many local people. Water for the works is pumped direct from a bore hole. Facilities for staff include a private sports club and a pond used by their fishing club. Fish breeding there include two varieties of carp, tench, roach, bream, rudd and perch. Other units in the park house another electronics factory, British Driver and the J.E.L. Energy Conservation Scheme. There are various empty units available for leasing.
